title: Taylor Swift's Fun New Video with Graham Norton
summary: Taylor Swift made a new music video for her song Opalite, and it has some famous people in it! Graham Norton, who is a funny TV host, and Lewis Capaldi, a singer, both star in the video. The video is set in the 1980s and is very silly. It shows an actor named Domhnall Gleeson who uses a magic potion on his cactus to bring Taylor Swift into his life. Graham Norton plays a salesman who says he can undo the magic. The idea for the video came from a joke on Graham Norton's TV show last year, where Domhnall said he wanted to be in a Taylor Swift video. Taylor Swift thought it was a great idea and wrote a script for everyone from that show to be in the video. The video premiered on Friday, and it's part of Taylor's big album called The Life Of A Showgirl.

background_read: Taylor Swift is a famous singer who makes music videos with fun stories. Graham Norton is a TV host known for his funny interviews. Music videos are like mini-movies that help tell the story of a song. This video is special because it includes stars from a TV show, showing how ideas can come from jokes and turn into big projects.
Article_Structure: WHO: Taylor Swift, Graham Norton, Lewis Capaldi, Domhnall Gleeson, and other actors
WHAT: A new music video for the song Opalite with a silly story about magic
WHERE: Set in the 1980s, premiered online
WHY: To have fun and include friends from a TV show joke

perspectives.description: The video shows how Taylor Swift works with other celebrities to create something fun and unexpected.
